front.title: IEEE Standard VITAL Application-Specific Integrated Circuit (ASIC) Modeling Specification

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by 1076.4-2000. The VITAL (VHDL Initiative Towards ASIC Libraries) ASIC Modeling Specification is defined. It creates a methodology that promotes the development of highly accurate, efficient simulation models for ASIC (Application-Specific Integrated Circuit) components in VHDL.
